title: Itsy Bitsy Spider
description: Emma Frost inherits a house on Fanoe Island, Denmark when her grandmother dies. She decides to move there with her family, much to her teenage-daughter's regret. One morning a wealthy old woman in her street is found murdered and soon Emma finds herself wrapped in a mystery uncovering the island's dark secrets that not only runs deep within the history of the island but also within her own family. From the author of the International Bestselling books, the Rebekka Franck-series comes a new Scandinavian Mystery destined to keep you up all night. The sequel Miss Polly had a dolly has just been released.
author: Willow Rose
